description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: Wiesbaden - centre of the fight against crime; recent innovations in methods of criminal detection are demonstrated; Belgrade - a meeting between PM Bijedic and President Tito with Chancellor Brandt as a gesture towards relaxing East-West tension in Europe; Schleswig-Holstein - the recent construction of the new Elder Dam; a portrait of Nolde the German Expressionist painter and finally, a table tennis tournament at Boblingen.
